raw_text: MAKAWITA – Mrs G.R. (a retired Teacher) wife of late retired Principal – Mr P. Widanagama who lived at No.08,​ Rahula Cross Road,​ Matara,​ mother of Renuka,​ Champika,​ Sanjeewa and Mirani,​ mother-in-law of Hemal,​ Ajith,​ Woshika and Lasantha,​ grandmother of Isuri,​ Janidu,​ Vihagi,​ Diduli,​ Navini and Venudi,​ passed away. Last rites will be done on November 8,​ 2023,​ today at 3.30 p.m. at the Matara Public Cemetery. 0777900486.072282
